Module the_project
Package food_related

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
food_related.Menu
public class Menu extends Object
Instantiation of Menu using Food items as parameter Creates a new ArrayList of Food (Menu) and add the 5 Food items to add 2 more types of food at a later stage. Follows the Single Responsibility principle as sole responsibility to add Food items into the ArrayList (Menu). Also follows the Open-Closed principle since the software entities is open for extension but closed for modifications.
Since:
2022-03-15
Version:
7.0
Author:
Isaac, Yan kai, Davis, Wenlu, Tomoki

    • Menu

      public Menu(Food f1, Food f2, Food f3, Food f4, Food f5)
      Instantiation of Menu using Food items as parameter Creates a new ArrayList of Food (Menu) and add the 5 Food items to add 2 more types of food at a later stage Follows the Single Responsibility principle as sole responsibility to add Food items into the ArrayList (Menu) Also follows the Open-Closed principle since the software entities is open for extension but closed for modifications
      Parameters:
      f1 - this is the first food for the Menu
      f2 - this is the second food for the Menu
      f3 - this is the third food for the Menu
      f4 - this is the fourth food for the Menu
      f5 - this is the fifth food for the Menu
